articles.author: Luke Andrews
articles.title: I thought my colon cancer was a hemorrhoid... here's how to tell the difference - Daily Mail
articles.description: Joshua Sanchez, a freelance artist in New York City, first became concerned when blood kept cropping up in his stool. Doctors diagnosed him with stage four colon cancer.
articles.content:
A New Yorker went to the doctor with what he thought were hemorrhoids only to be told he had late-stage cancer.
Joshua Sanchez, now 38, from Harlem, first became concerned when he noticed blood appe… [+8618 chars]

articles.title: Lung adenocarcinoma promotion by air pollutants - Nature.com
articles.description: Combination of epidemiology, preclinical models and ultradeep DNA profiling of clinical cohorts unpicks the inflammatory mechanism by which air pollution promotes lung cancer

articles.author: Jamie Carter
articles.title: The Northern Lights Have Been Detected On An Earth-Sized Planet Just 12 Light-Years Away - Forbes
articles.description: An exoplanet just 12 light-years beyond our solar system is sending out radio signals that may be evidence of an Earth-like magnetic field and atmosphere.
articles.content:
Have researchers found aurora on an alien exoplanet? (artist's impression)
